name: Arima Imports
description: Importing And Exporting of superior qua
overview:
Arima Import & Exports offer a variety of products to protect and improve the client requirements. Our business was established in the year 2012. We believe in providing the best quality products with possible features to our customers. To achieve our goal, we have a determined focus on growth. Our range includes Sea Foods, Papad, Corn, Pickles, Fresh Coconut, Spices, White Rice and Coir Products, etc.

Our Product Range: Hybrid invertor Batteries Pickles Fresh Coconut

Vendor Base: We have connected ourselves with only the specialized and the most reputed vendors in the market. These vendors offer an unmatched range of these products to us. Our professionals check for the quality standards followed by these vendors and their compliance to deliver the products within the committed time frame. These vendors are chosen by our experts after thorough market survey to ascertain their credibility. We ensure that they abide by the international standards of the industry.

Our Quality Assurance: Our professionals give consistent and dedicated efforts to provide our customers the comprehensive range of Food Products. Our organization is backed by a team of quality experts who keep a close eye on the each activity of production unit. We use hi-tech machinery to provide quality products to our customers. The wide array of products is well known for their freshness. We use high quality packaging materials to pack this product.

Clients Satisfaction: We are a client centric organization, providing client satisfaction is the prime factors of the company. We have multiplied enormous consumers throughout the global market for the quality products that we offer. Our range is well famous for the clarity and perfect structure appearances that made us to keep a long relationship with the various consumers”.
